vote.title: To authorize the Director of the Department of Public Utilities to enter into a professional services agreement with Stantec Consulting Services for the Lexington Avenue Area Water Line Improvements Project; to authorize an amendment to the 2022 Capital Improvement Budget; and to authorize the expenditure of up to $287,870.77 from the Water General Obligations Bond Fund.  ($287,870.77)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
